lines.text: If you ask me, it costs too much.
What?
Love. It's way overpriced.
It's beautiful
Course it's beautiful, did you think I'd take you to an ugly mountain?

[to Harold]
H! Fuck the rules!
[starts climbing a building]
What about, uh, Dallas? What's his name? What's his problem?
Dallas Woolf. We went to Law School together. He was good in the classroom... I was better in the courtroom. There's no contest in the bedroom!

[Harold and Taylor are in a tent]
Hey Taylor, you awake?
No.
Mrs. Perkins, dinner tonight?
What about it?
Have it with me.
No.
C'mon! Why not?
Look Mr. Brooks, I already have a date.
Break it! Overtime.
Thanks. But I nerver shit where I eat.
Oooh. I wasn't aware, Mrs. Perkins, you shit at all!
You climatizing, Harold?
Good news or bad news when you bleed from your ears?
Good news.
What the Hell is goin' on?
Just lost the porters.
What are we going to do now?
Fuck them. We don't need them, we are taking by ourselves.
That's 7 tons of gear. When you wanna do this, before or after you get dressed?
I didn't make the world the way it is, Harold. I'm just trying to get through it, as fast and as clean as possible.

[after staring straight at him for 5 seconds]
We ALL make the world the way it is.
Yeah, well, we know who made this.
[Taylor tosses his unfinished bowl of oatmeal into the pot and exits the tent]
